text: ? is the second studio album by American rapper, XXXTentacion. ? was released on March 16, 2018. It was the last album that he released before his murder. On December 23, 2017, while on house arrest, X announced the album along with Bad Vibes Forever and Skins. On ?, X explores many different genres from emo rap to alternative rock. He has features from notable artists like drummer Travis Barker from Blink-182 and rappers Joey Bada$$ and PnB Rock. A Deluxe Anniversary Edition of the album was also released and featured "Nocturne", a tribute song by video game composer Yoko Shimomura. Shimomura said that she made the song because X was a big fan of the Kingdom Hearts video game series and her music. The album debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200 and selling 131,000 album-equivalent units. The album became X's only album to reach #1 during his lifetime. ? has become 5Ã— Platinum since it's release. The album featured the singles "Sad!", "Changes", and "Moonlight". ==Songs== ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:XXXTentacion albums
title: ? (XXXTentacion album)
